titleStmt.title: A true and perfect narrative of the strange and unexpected finding the crucifix & gold-chain of that pious prince, St. Edward, the King and Confessor which was found after 620 years interment and presented to His Most Sacred Majesty, King James the Second / by Charles Taylour, Gent.
titleStmt.author: H. K. (Henry Keepe), 1652-1688.

titleStmt.title: A true and perfect narrative of the strange and unexpected finding the crucifix & gold-chain of that pious prince, St. Edward, the King and Confessor which was found after 620 years interment and presented to His Most Sacred Majesty, King James the Second / by Charles Taylour, Gent.
titleStmt.author: H. K. (Henry Keepe), 1652-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Charles Taylour is a pseudonym for Henry Keepe.
